section1.title:
Explore Your Genes
Define Your Future
section1.description: Data-driven & scientifically proven reports that help you design the optimal lifestyle for you and your family.

footer.text: * Paying the starting fee will give you access to our Care package. Unlock the Pro package to enjoy the full benefits.

1.title: Purchase your testing kit
1.description: Your Genetica DNA testing kit will be delivered directly to your door after purchase.

2.title: Collect your saliva sample
2.description: Simply follow the instruction found inside the DNA tesing kit to collect your saliva. Once ready, send your saliva back to us for DNA analysis.

3.title: Results ready in 30 working days
3.description: Install the Genetica mobile app to view your comprehensive results and personalized recommendations.

sectionPrivacyAndSecurityStatement.title: Privacy And Security
sectionPrivacyAndSecurityStatement.description: Your information is completely safe with Genetica®. We take utmost care to ensure that your data is protected, secured and available only to you.

header.title: Advised by leading experts
header.description: Our Board of Advisors comprises of Silicon Valey's most successful investors and top professors from Ivy League universities like Harvard, Stanford, Cornell, etc.

cta.content:
Genetica has served thousands of customers and helped them optimize their lifestyles.

Let’s hear their inspiring stories and tell us yours.

comment.title: Amazing services
comment.content: I am satisfied with the Gene report of Genetica® Service. To know this Gene analysis is meaningful to me for rearranging my exercises more effectively.

comment.title: Amazing services
comment.content: The Gene report of Genetica® Service of GENETICA® help me to understand my strengths and weaknesses. This allows me to personalize my fitness plan to perform well.

comment.title: Amazing services
comment.content: I could define the practicing method which is tailored-made for my health and the exercise progress.
